ai-tha-ap193:0.3_0: Hearing this sal tree flowers, the seniors,
ai-tha-ap193:2.3_0: I bowed down to the Buddha,
ai-tha-ap193:3.1_0: The lie down on the same sheet
ai-tha-ap193:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap193:4.2_0: like the moon in the imagine—
ai-tha-ap193:5.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap193:5.2_0: and skeleton without flesh or blood,
ai-tha-ap193:5.3_0: I have realized the six kinds of direct knowledge,
ai-tha-ap193:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Sañjikāputta.
